overview: It is the story of Raja, who was found abandoned near a garbage dump by a kind hearted man "when he was just a few days old" Now grown up, he helps everyone in the poor and downtrodden basti where he lives. One day, due to floods in her village, a young lady played by Sarika comes to live with a good for nothing relative "Mac Mohan" in this basti. Mac Mohan tried to sell her services to some rich old men. Puneet Issar is a honest police officer fighting crime in this area. What happens when these three lives connect is what the film Zinda Laash is all about.
title: The Living Corpse
